name: WP Shortcode by Drimify
author: Drimify

sections.description:
Gamification platform. Engage your audience. Reach your goals.
Customise experiences and games in minutes. #GamificationSuperpowers

Easily integrate your Drimify applications to your WordPress website using shortcodes. A shortcode allows you to add complex features to your site quickly and easily. In this case, you’re simply copying a shortcode specific to your app from Drimify.com, and pasting it into your WordPress site.

Do not hesitate to get in touch with our Support team if you need help.

Support

All support for this plugin is provided through our site:
https://help.drimify.com/

Installation ==update spin build

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the Drimify Widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Retrieve the shortcode from your app created in Drimify.com, paste it to your page in WP, and, “Voilà!”
sections.faq:
Drimify Widget is not working

Please disable all plugins and check if the WP Shortcode by Drimify plugin is working properly. Then you can enable all plugins one by one to find out which plugin is conflicting with the WP Shortcode by Drimify plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Plugin release supporting new platform.

1.0

  • Official plugin release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Simply copy the code generated for your game on go.drimify.com

  2. Once pasted in your post/page, your game will show

short_description: Drimify Widget is a free WP plugin, that provides easy way to integrate your HTML5 games and interactive contents created on Drimify.com
